HomePage.title: Hello world!
HomePage.subtitle: Mostly a backend developer — I still try my best to craft tidy frontends with Java, Kotlin, and a splash of React magic.
HomePage.heading: Latest project update

AboutMe.farming: I grew up working on farms and spent several years in agriculture before moving to Germany in 2019. Those years shaped a lot of my work ethic—long hours, hands-on problem-solving, and staying calm when things don’t go as planned.
AboutMe.photography: After settling in Germany, I started freelancing in photography. Running a small one-person business taught me responsibility, working with clients, and building something from scratch.
AboutMe.42: Over time, my interests shifted toward tech. I retrained as a software developer and joined 42 Heilbronn, where I learned C, C++, algorithms, and system programming in a peer-driven learning environment.
AboutMe.schwarz: Most recently, I completed my internship at Schwarz IT, working with Kotlin, Java, TypeScript, Docker, and microservice architectures. It confirmed that software development is exactly where I want to build my career.
